PSCT.Vegas:
① If only your opponent controls a monster: Special Summon 1 FIRE Beast/Beast-Warrior/Winged-Beast from your Deck. 
(Its effects are negated, also it is destroyed during the End Phase). 
(You can only activate 1 "Onslaught of the Fire Kings" per turn).

PSCT.Base: If your opponent controls a monster and you control no monsters: Special Summon 1 FIRE Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast monster from your Deck. Its effects are negated, also it is destroyed during the End Phase. You can only activate 1 "Onslaught of the Fire Kings" per turn.
